name: Survival Planet
description: Stranded in alien planet, you need to find your crew while trying to survive and contact the earth
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: AMD A10 5750 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6870 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: the requirement maybe or may not be change during the development, this is just a simple guide
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core I5 4460 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: the requirement maybe or may not be change during the development, this is just a simple guide
